name: @gumigumih/react-calculator-input-form
description: React電卓入力フォームプラグイン - 税込税抜計算機能付き

scripts.docs:build:check: [ -d docs/dist ] && [ "$(ls -A docs/dist | wc -l)" -gt 0 ] || (echo 'docs/dist is missing or empty' && exit 1)
scripts.verify:dist: [ -d dist ] && [ "$(ls -A dist | wc -l)" -gt 0 ] || (echo 'dist is missing or empty' && exit 1)
scripts.verify:version: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const {execSync}=require('child_process'); try{const published=execSync('npm view '+pkg.name+' version',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim(); if(published===pkg.version){console.error('Version '+pkg.version+' already published. Bump version.'); process.exit(1);} console.log('local='+pkg.version+' published='+published);}catch(e){console.log('No published version.');}"
scripts.verify:tag: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const {execSync}=require('child_process'); try{execSync('git fetch --tags --quiet',{stdio:'ignore'}); execSync('git rev-parse -q --verify refs/tags/v'+pkg.version,{stdio:'ignore'}); console.error('Git tag v'+pkg.version+' exists.'); process.exit(1);}catch(e){}"

author: gumigumih
